content: {"name": "St. Bernard of Clairvaux", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Call +1 (301) 277-1000 by Tuesday to confirm schedule and make an appointment since there's no fix distribution day/time.", "email": "", "url": "https://adw.org/parishes/st-bernard-of-clairvaux/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "5700 Saint Bernard Drive", "address_2": null, "city": "Riverdale", "state_province": "MD", "postal_code": "20737", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 38.9570608, "longitude": -76.91638619999999}, "phones": [{"number": "(301) 277-1000", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": ""}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Must bring own bags/cart"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Call in advance for services"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}]}
